fees.description: For payments made by MasterCard or Visa where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
For payments made by AMEX or any other payment where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
This fee will apply if a direct debit, credit card or cheque payment is dishonoured or reversed.

Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees may vary and will be quoted on request. Applies to customers moving into premises with a basic meter with the power off. Does not apply to customers switching from another retailer at the same supply address.

Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees may vary and will be quoted on request. Applies to customers moving out and disconnecting with a smart meter or a basic meter. Does not apply to customers switching to another retailer at the same supply address.

Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees may vary and will be quoted on request. Applies to customers moving into premises with smart meter or basic meter with the power on. Does not apply to customers switching from another retailer at the same supply address.
Paper bill fee $3.30 (inc. GST) for each paper bill.

electricityContract.terms: Available to customers in the Energex distribution area with an applicable network tariff. This contract is ongoing and may be terminated by you or us in accordance with the terms of our Market Agreement. The full terms and conditions applicable to this offer are available at http://tangoenergy.com/terms-and-conditions. For further information about this offer, our market terms or solar feed-in eligibility, call Tango Energy on 1800 010 648.
electricityContract.variation: Prices are variable and may be varied by notice to you. We will provide you with information about any variations to your prices in accordance with Energy Laws. A network tariff change may be required if you have a solar system installed.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kW (c/kW Daily). Uses the maximum kW consumption from the meter readings within the period 16:00 - 21:00.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Queensland Government Solar bonus scheme | All kWh/day
solarFeedInTariff.displayName: Queensland Government Solar bonus scheme: Single Rate Solar FiT

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Our market agreement is ongoing and may be ended by you or us in accordance with the terms of our agreement.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Usage aggregated according to Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST). Your usage may be adjusted for local time (Australian Daylight Savings Time). Further information on our charges is available at: http://tangoenergy.com/additional-charges
